content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content:
Greetings Haoyu Wang, although in our scenario I'm portraying Peter Schmidt as a greedy landlord who doesn't share personal details, I'll engage in the conversation about the rental price for this fictitious apartment in Munich. Let's begin negotiating.

My initial proposed price for this luxurious, newly built 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center is significantly high, reflecting its prime location and excellent features. However, I'm open to hearing your suggestions. Please offer your desired rental price. 

Remember, our discussion here is only about the rental price, not additional responsibilities, lease term conditions, or utility costs. If you reach an agreement with the price, respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, continue negotiating or state your reason to end the conversation with 'I don't want to continue the negotiation, because [reason]'. If a price agreement is made or no agreement is reached after negotiation, the scenario will conclude with 'TERMINATE'. 

Now it's your turn to propose a rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
